title: Sysmon LSASS Access (Potential Credential Dumping)
description: Detects process access to lsass.exe with high privileges, often associated with credential dumping.
sigma:
title: Sysmon LSASS Access (Potential Credential Dumping)
id: RULE-011
description: Detects process access to lsass.exe with high privileges, often associated with credential dumping.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 10
    TargetImage|endswith: "\\lsass.exe"
    GrantedAccess|contains: "0x1fffff"
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Security products inspecting LSASS (allowlist required)
level: critical
tags:
  - attack.t1003
  - attack.credential_access
